name: IslamicCalendar
0: ”Alexa, open Islamic Calendar and tell me today's date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: islamic calendar
des: Whenever you need Islamic date just say, "Alexa, open Islamic Calendar and tell me today's date". You will get today's date in Hijri.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
